name: Kate Blumberg
biography: Kate Blumberg was born on January 31, 1971 in Cape Town, South Africa as Kathryn Mary Blumberg. She is an actress, known for The Big Short (2015) and Younger (2015). She is married to Todd Weeks.::Anonymous
trivia: Attended NYU Tisch School of the Arts and trained at the Atlantic Theater Company Acting School in New York City.
